title: A stunning 1b/1b apartment
posting_body: Fabulous location of 1b/1 b apartment at very desirable town of Nahant.
Stunning ocean and Boston views at new private deck!
High ceiling living and bedroom with hardwood floors, very nice eat-in kitchen, newly renovated full  bath.
The apartment is the end unit, and it offers a privacy and a lot of light from the S/SW, delightful summer/autumn ocean breezes; a lot of water and other activities.
The unit has an attached garage.
Condo rent includes all utilities except electric.
There are Nahant Thicket Wildlife Sanctuary, Conservation area, Lowlands park, and others to explore and enjoy.
The unit is available to move- in either on 9/1/2022 or 10/1/2022 for one year
